casebody.data:
Friday, October 2, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

98-921. State v. Carter.

Trumbull C.P. No. 97CR558. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Trumbull County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for extension of time for transmission of record,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for extension of time for transmission of the record be, and hereby is, granted, and the time for transmitting the record is extended to October 8, 1998. No further extensions will be granted.
